translations.skillsSubtitle: Technologies and tools mastered to deliver exceptional digital experiences
translations.experienceSubtitle: My professional journey building innovative technology solutions
translations.experienceFreelanceDescription: Development of corporate, institutional websites and SaaS applications. I manage complete digital presence including web development, video editing and social media strategy.
translations.experienceArzionDescription: Software Factory where I developed and maintained unit testing systems, led the frontend development of RestroSimple.com (complete application for gastronomic order management), implemented automated testing architecture with Cypress, migrated legacy application from vanilla JavaScript to React for iGlobal.co, and closely collaborated with design and backend teams using agile methodology.
translations.experienceArzionHighlight1: Significant reduction of bugs in production
translations.experienceArzionHighlight2: Leadership in frontend development from scratch
translations.testimonialsSubtitle: What my clients say about my work
translations.contactSubtitle: Have a project in mind? I’d love to hear about it and help bring it to life
translations.contactIntro: I’m always open to discussing new opportunities, interesting projects, or just chatting about technology and web development.
translations.heroDescription: I help companies and brands build and improve their online presence through clean code, modern interfaces and exceptional user experiences.
